title: Your Store is Bugged
body: I wanted to gift Illoai to somebody, but I can't get past selecting the person, and then if I click any other store tab, nothing happens. I can play games just fine. Only the store is broken.

replies.body:
Hey ManBearPig916,

We had some issues with the store this morning. This should be resolved.
Having exact same issue, Store takes forever to load and gets stuck at friend select and if I do somehow get past that it refuses to finalize.

I can't load anything past the store home screen. If i click any of the tabs, the store session expires and it immediately goes back to the store home screen. Been trying to buy a mystery skin for 2 days.

Tried relogging several times.

If i click try to purchase the mystery skin AT the store home screen, the box pops up, there's an animation of Katarina dancing for about 1 second, then it disappears and does nothing.

I  had an issue with my store not being able to access the skins tab.  The store ran extremely slow for me and I was able to access all other tabs aside from the "skins" tab.  I couldn't even click on the Snowdown skins on "featured" to bring me to the skins page.  Hopefully this issue has been resolved today.
I've been trying to access the store to gift, buy skins, etc. Store is extremely slow down to 7 sec delay on performing every task, gifts won't go thru; all i can do is buy RP.
Same, only gifting though, i was able to buy a champ like nothing, no delay
Im trying to get n esports mystery skin, same problem{{summoner:3}}

Same! 
Im trying to gift a skin to someone and I get stuck on the finalizing page. 

I play games just fine.
yeah, but I think it just happens to the gifting one {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
